long_description: The Thule Pivoting Tandem rooftop bike carrier hauls your tandem or recumbent bike. Pivoting fork mount design allows 1 person to load/unload bike; fork mount features a removable pin that allows mount pivot out for fork attachment. Remove front wheel, lift front of bike and clamp fork into the fork mount; lift rear wheel into tray and attach. 75 in. long wheel tray is constructed of corrosion-resistant aluminum with stainless-steel hardware. Rear tray can be removed for trunk/hatch clearance or single bike transport. Thule Pivoting Tandem fits Thule rack systems or round crossbars. All mounting hardware included. Please note: bike must come equipped with a quick-release front skewer; not compatible with fork drop outs less than 4mm thick.
short_description: The Thule Pivoting Tandem rooftop bike carrier hauls your tandem or recumbent bike.
